posts.author: TheSquid
posts.content:
Hi all. Anyone knows if, and how, the Counterspell action can be assigned to a quickbar slot? The obvious way (right click the clot and look for the action from the radial menu) does not seem to work for me (the action icon is "grayed out" in the radial menu).
Many thanks!

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
It can't be Quickslotted.

It was changed, long ago, due to a...rather nasty exploit.

So either you use the radial, learn to dial with the Numpad...

OR

Use a programmable mouse/keyboard.

Sent from my SM-G955F using Tapatalk

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
webshaman1 wrote:
Feb 24, 2023
It was changed, long ago, due to a...rather nasty exploit.
It's a pity they had to solve it like that. Quick slotting active feats/modes is quite handy.
When reading different forums, I get the impression that people don't use counterspelling a lot. One reason is that it is not practical to use the radial menu in the heat of action.
There are situations where counterspelling has something to offer. As it is, most people probably rather dispel or breach.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
While true, the exploit was horribly broken, and impossible for Mod Makers and PW Builders to prevent otherwise (hardcoded stuff) without getting rid of Counterspelling totally.

That said, anything (keyboard, mouse, etc) that can be programmed can bring it back (well, not exactly, but it does put Counterspelling on one button again).
